text: @WhiteHouse The Doctor just confirmed WA Post acturately quoted him, and Dr appears he's been reprimanded by Trump... Looks fake!  Many Doctors have said there is a good chance there Will  BE a Second Wave of CoronaVirus in addition to the Flu!
